Package Network

Interface GameClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Client
    public interface GameClient
    Interface containing all necessary methods that are to be used by the client.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean close()
      Closes the connection between the client and server.
      boolean connection​(java.net.InetAddress address, int port)
      Starts up the connection.
      boolean returnPong()
      Sends a PONG message to the server.
      boolean sendHello​(java.lang.String name)
      Sends the HELLO message to the server.
      boolean sendList()
      Sends a LIST message to the server.
      boolean sendLogin​(java.lang.String username)
      Sends a LOGIN message to the server.
      boolean sendMove​(int input1, int input2)
      Sends a MOVE message to the server.
      boolean sendPing()
      Sends a PING message to the server.
      boolean sendQueue()
      Sends a QUEUE message to the server.
      boolean sendQuit()
      Sends a QUIT message to the server.

    • Method Detail

      • connection

        boolean connection​(java.net.InetAddress address,
                   int port)
        Starts up the connection.
        Parameters:
        address - IP address
        port - port number
        Returns:
        true if connection established, false if not established
        Requires
        address instanceOf InetAddress

      • close

        boolean close()
        Closes the connection between the client and server.
        Returns:
        true if connection terminated, false if not terminated.

      • sendMove

        boolean sendMove​(int input1,
                 int input2)
        Sends a MOVE message to the server.
        Parameters:
        input1 - first input
        input2 - second input
        Returns:
        true if move was sent, false if it wasn't
        Requires
        input1 >= 0 && input1 < 36, input2 >= 0 && input2 < 8

      • sendLogin

        boolean sendLogin​(java.lang.String username)
        Sends a LOGIN message to the server.
        Parameters:
        username - username of the player
        Returns:
        true if the login was sent, false if it wasn't

      • sendHello

        boolean sendHello​(java.lang.String name)
        Sends the HELLO message to the server.
        Parameters:
        name - username of the player
        Returns:
        true if HELLO was sent, false if it wasn't

      • sendList

        boolean sendList()
        Sends a LIST message to the server.
        Returns:
        true if LIST was sent, false if it wasn't

      • sendQuit

        boolean sendQuit()
        Sends a QUIT message to the server.
        Returns:
        true if QUIT was sent, false if it wasn't

      • sendQueue

        boolean sendQueue()
        Sends a QUEUE message to the server.
        Returns:
        true if QUEUE was sent, false if it wasn't

      • sendPing

        boolean sendPing()
        Sends a PING message to the server.
        Returns:
        true if PING was sent, false if it wasn't

      • returnPong

        boolean returnPong()
        Sends a PONG message to the server.
        Returns:
        true if PONG was sent, false if it wasn't
